project-challenges: I anticipate there will be many.
project-purpose: Using your phone's built in voice recognition software, issue commands, praise, and treats to encourage your cat to learn.
project-inspiration: I thought voice recognition would be a good way to interact in a VR world with the tech that I have. I like animals and currently am playing Ark, where taming creatures is the component of the game I like most.
project-subtitle: Tame your unruly feline into the purrfect pet!
